Class Ant

  • java.lang.Object
    • Ant

  • public class Ant
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to represent the ants. Each ant knows its its current position and its previous position, as well as the location of its home. Furthermore, ants can be carrying a fixed amount of sugar.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Ant(Colony home)
      Constructor: returns a new ant, at home.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean carrying()
      Informs whether this ant is currently carrying sugar.
      Node current()
      Returns a reference to the node where this ant currently is.
      void dropSugar()
      Models dropping sugar.
      Precondition: this ant is at home AND this ant is carrying sugar.
      Colony home()
      Returns a reference to this ant's home node.
      boolean isAtHome()
      Informs whether this ant is currently at home.
      void move(Node location)
      Moves this ant to a new location.
      Precondition: there should be an edge between this ant's current location and its new location.
      void pickUpSugar()
      Models picking sugar from a location.
      Precondition: there is sugar at the current node AND this ant is not carrying sugar.
      Node previous()
      Returns a reference to the node where this ant was before moving to the current node.
      boolean wasAtHome()
      Informs whether this ant's previous location was home.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        Models picking sugar from a location.

        Models dropping sugar.
